channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AR

item.title: Report X-2024091837
item.description:
Report X-2024091837

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-24
  • City: LOWELL
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: UN3363 Dangerous Goods in Machinery gas power washer. Small amount of gas in tank and on outer box. Lowes failed to remove all gas prior to shipment. Undeclared hazmat. Unable to place in hazmat drum due to size.
